1.battle_desc: All team members' Mod Index Multiplier +40%.
1.name: Olympus

2.name: Nile
2.desc: All team members' Crit Rate in Modified Mode +30%.

3.battle_desc: All team members' DMG +5% for every 1 enemy on the field.
3.name: Shinou
3.desc: Deals DMG to enemies on field equal to 8% of the total DMG dealt in current Modified Mode when the Mod exits Modified Mode.

4.battle_desc: Restores all team members' Combat Resources to full when they enter the battle.
4.name: Yggdrasill
4.desc: Restores all team members' Combat Resources to full when entering Modified Mode. Combat Resources charge rate +100% during Modified Mode.

5.battle_desc: Inflicts DMG that ignores DEF equal to 25% of ATK upon each hit by any member of the team.
5.name: Asterism
5.desc: Enemies in Modified Mode take 25% more DMG.

9.battle_desc: All team members' Rating gain rate +20%. Duration of Ω Modifying Level +5s. When Modifying Level is B/A/S/Ω, all team members' ATK +10%/15%/20%/25%.
9.name: Tian Yuan
9.desc: Modifying Level is always full at Level Ω in Modified Mode.
